snippet: The move comes after one of the biggest shareholders in Angie’s List urged the company to consider selling itself.
abstract: DealBook Online; IAC/InterActiveCorp makes public offer of around $512 million for Angie's List after private deal was rebuffed.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The move comes after one of the biggest shareholders in Angie’s List urged the company to consider selling itself.

headline.main: IAC/InterActiveCorp Offers to Buy Angie’s List
